Sentence.sentence: They help humans kill harmful insects.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A study by the Centre for Research on the Epidemiology of Disasters finds that, between 1980 and 2007, nearly 8,400 natural disasters killed more than twomillion people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Your job is literally killing you, as The Washington Post put it.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Brazil opened a research station in 1984, but it was largely destroyed by a fire that killed two members of the navy in 2012, the same year that a diesel-laden Brazilian barge sank near the base.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In Pakistan, 1,000women die in honor killings every year.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The wolves would kill deer of course.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They would also terrorize and kill dogs and cats which is not what the suburban dwellers have in mind
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They would eventually kill off the deer.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The Sudan version was deadly enough, killing 50% of those it infected.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Ebola was so deadly and killed so quickly that within a short period of time, there was no one around to infect.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: While holding a burial ceremony for a pet mouse, they were killing pest mice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In the peak of the dot.com bubble, brick and mortar retail was one of those industries the internet was going to kill—and quickly.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The experiment is based upon the idea that farmers who're protecting their herd from lions would shoot and kill lions in an effort to protect their livestock.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Under the first law, a robot could not harm a dangerous gunman, but under the zeroth law, a robot could kill the gunman to save others.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"杀，杀死"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: kill, murder, slaughter, massacre, assassinate, execute
means: kill ： 普通用词，含义广泛，泛指以任何方式使人、动物或植物死亡。
slaughter ： 本义指大批宰杀动物，也指像屠宰牲畜一样一次杀死许多人。
massacre语气比slaughter强。指大屠杀，尤指屠杀失去了自卫能力的人。
assassinate ： 通常指因政治原因用非法手段杀害政治领袖人物或短名人士。

Sentence.sentence: An avalanche once closed the path, killing 63 people.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But they will have to find the were-rabbit before gun-crazy hunter victor Quartermaine who is desperate to kill it.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Corrado, a translator for the army during wwii, was killed in action in Europe.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Electrical lines have been killing them off.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: For the past two years, Gordon's students have been studying ways to kill bacteria in zero gravity, and they think they're close to a solution.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: I had a very poor relationship with food: I used it to kill bad feelings, to make myself feel better, and to celebrate.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: If he didn't, his body temperature would get very low, which could quickly kill him.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: In 1897, the state of Michigan passed a law prohibiting the killing of passenger pigeons but by then, no sizable flocks had been seen in the state for 10 years.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the ocean, we fished for top predators such as cod on an industrial scale, while on land, we killed off large predators such as wolves.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Many farmers opposed the plan because they feared that wolves would kill their farm animals or pets.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Measles, which once killed 450 children each year and disabled even more, was nearly wiped out in the united states 14 years ago by the universal use of the MMR vaccine.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: People believed there was an ever-lasting supply and killed them by the thousands, commercial hunters attracted them to small clearings with grain.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: She refused to live with male cranes, and even had a reputation for killing some of them, which made it impossible for her to become a mother.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: So if we send out a robot with the single instruction of fetching coffee, it will have a strong desire to secure success by disabling its own off switch or even killing anyone who might interfere with its task.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: So, I was killing my time at home until June 2012 when I discovered the online computer courses of your training center.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The most recent powerful nino, in 1997-98, killed around 21, 000 people and caused damage worth $36 billion around the globe.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Though the relationship may not be causal, helping divided communities to prepare for disasters would at least reduce the risk that those disasters are followed by killing and wounding people.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: "Young birds are often attracted to the warm road surface and get killed by the traffic." Biology student Hannah tells the broadcaster.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: But don't bother trying to kill off old habits; once those ruts of procedure are worn into the hippocampus, they're there to stay.

Sentence.sentence: Time was when biologists somewhat overworked the evidence that these creatures preserve the health of game by killing the physically weak, or that they prey only on "worthless"species.

Sentence.sentence: But postal special-interest groups seem to have killed it, at least in the House.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: She adds, however, that "to decide is to kill off all possibilities but one."
Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Under the plan, for example, the agency said it would not prosecute landowners or businesses that unintentionally kill, harm, or disturb the bird, as long as they had signed a range-wide management plan to restore prairie chicken habitat.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

jx.jx_en_mean: To destroy in such large numbers as to render extinct.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 企业成功交易时在场或受益

jx.jx_en_mean: take decisive action to turn a situation to one's advantage

lj.lj_ly: we are going to smile and be pleasant if it kills us.
lj.lj_ls: 无论如何我们都要微笑，都要高兴。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)(of a remedy for a problem) likely to either work well or fail catastrophically, with no possibility of partial success
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英)（问题的补救）孤注一掷；非死即活；不成功便成仁

lj.lj_ly: the spring Budget will be kill or cure.
lj.lj_ls: 春季预算将会是孤注一掷的行为。

phrase.cizu_name: kill two birds with one stone

lj.lj_ly: there is every possibility all river life would be killed off for generations.

jx.jx_en_mean: (of an animal) yield (a specified amount of meat) when slaughtered

phrase.cizu_name: in at the kill 或 in on the kill

jx.jx_en_mean: Present at the moment of triumph.

entry.def: If a person, animal, or other living thing is killed, something or someone causes them to die.

example.ex: More than 1,000 people have been killed by the armed forces...
He had attempted to kill himself on several occasions...

entry.def: The act of killing an animal after hunting it is referred to as the kill .

example.ex: After the kill the men and old women collect in an open space and eat a meal of whale meat.
example.tran: 捕杀过后，男人们和老年妇女们聚集到一片空地上吃了一顿鲸鱼肉。

entry.def: If someone or something kills a project, activity, or idea, they completely destroy or end it.

example.ex: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether...
example.tran: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

example.ex: Public opinion may yet kill the proposal.
example.tran: 舆论可能最终会扼杀这个提议。

entry.def: If something kills pain, it weakens it so that it is no longer as strong as it was.

example.ex: He was forced to take opium to kill the pain.
example.tran: 他被迫服用鸦片来止痛。

entry.def: If you say that something is killing you, you mean that it is causing you physical or emotional pain.
If you say that you kill yourself to do something, you are emphasizing that you make a great effort to do it, even though it causes you a lot of trouble or suffering.

example.ex: You shouldn't always have to kill yourself to do well.
example.tran: 你不该总是为了做到尽善尽美而累坏自己。

entry.def: If you say that you will kill someone for something they have done, you are emphasizing that you are extremely angry with them.

example.ex: Tell Richard I'm going to kill him when I get hold of him.
example.tran: 告诉理查德，一旦抓住他，我要杀了他。

entry.def: If you say that something will not kill you, you mean that it is not really as difficult or unpleasant as it might seem.

example.ex: Three or four more weeks won't kill me!
example.tran: 再过3周或4周不会要了我的命！

entry.def: If you are killing time, you are doing something because you have some time available, not because you really want to do it.

example.ex: I'm just killing time until I can talk to the other witnesses...
example.tran: 在和其他目击者交谈前我只是在打发时间。

example.ex: To kill the hours while she waited, Ann worked in the garden.
example.tran: 为了打发等待的那几个小时，安在菜园里干些活。

entry.def: If you say that you will do something if it kills you, you are emphasizing that you are determined to do it even though it is extremely difficult or painful.
entry.tran: (表示强调)即使很难，即便很费力

example.ex: I'll make this marriage work if it kills me.
example.tran: 再难我也要努力使这桩婚姻幸福美满。

entry.def: If you say that you killed yourself laughing, you are emphasizing that you laughed a lot because you thought something was extremely funny.
entry.tran: 使笑得前仰后合；使笑死了

entry.def: If you move in for the kill or if you close in for the kill, you take advantage of a changed situation in order to do something that you have been preparing to do.

example.ex: Seeing his chance, Dennis moved in for the kill.
example.tran: 看到机会来了，丹尼斯开始采取行动。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of terminating a life
2. the destruction of an enemy plane or ship or tank or missile;

sentences.sentence: "the pilot reported two kills during the mission"

means.word_mean: 1. cause to die; put to death, usually intentionally or knowingly;

sentences.sentence: "This man killed several people when he tried to rob a bank"
"The farmer killed a pig for the holidays"

means.word_mean: 2. thwart the passage of;
3. cause the death of, without intention;

sentences.sentence: "She was killed in the collision of three cars"

means.word_mean: 4. end or extinguish by forceful means;
5. be fatal;
6. be the source of great pain for;
7. overwhelm with hilarity, pleasure, or admiration;

sentences.sentence: "The comedian was so funny, he was killing me!"

means.word_mean: 8. hit with so much force as to make a return impossible, in racket games;
9. hit with great force;
10. deprive of life;
11. drink down entirely;

sentences.sentence: "She killed a bottle of brandy that night"
"They popped a few beer after work"

means.word_mean: 12. mark for deletion, rub off, or erase;

sentences.sentence: "kill these lines in the President's speech"

means.word_mean: 13. tire out completely;

sentences.sentence: "The daily stress of her work is killing her"

means.word_mean: 14. cause to cease operating;
15. destroy a vitally essential quality of or in;

sentences.sentence: "Eating artichokes kills the taste of all other foods"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'strike, beat', also 'put to death'): probably of Germanic origin and related to quell. The noun originally denoted a stroke or blow

means: 使笑得前仰后合，使笑死了

sentences.en: Three people were killed in the crash.

sentences.en: He tried to kill himself with sleeping pills.

sentences.en: Scores were killed and observers pronounced it the most fraudulent poll they had witnessed.

sentences.en: The instantaneous release from an impact would potentially kill off species in a few thousand years.

sentences.en: This disinfectant kills most germs.

sentences.en: When he had killed the guard, the prisoner of war quickly dragged him into the bushes.

sentences.en: DDT sprayed into the air kills mosquitoes and other insect pests.

sentences.en: Once energized, the dye forms singlet oxygen, a reactive molecule that kills bacteria.

sentences.en: The protagonist arrives, kills the dragon, fucks the princess and kills her, then leaves.

sentences.en: They have enough armor and health to kill monsters without any smoke and mirror tricks.

sentences.en: This organization killed hundreds of American marines in 1983.

sentences.en: Later, the bulls are killed by toreadors in another popular spectacle : the bullfight.

sentences.en: Sobbingly, the teenager admitted killing the baby.

sentences.en: How could you kill you ally?

sentences.en: Monsters of all kinds are standing in your way, they can kill and freeze you.

sentences.en: Each frog produces enough of the toxin to kill 10 humans.

sentences.en: One of the missiles falls short inside the Gaza Strip, killing a family of five.

sentences.en: The alcohol dissolves their waxy coatings, and kills the pest.

sentences.en: He was crazy enough to kill me if I hadn't told him who owned the car.

sentences.en: Lycopene is a powerful antioxidant capable of killing free radicals, the harmful molecules linked to cancer.

sentences.en: They killed two men in retaliation for a bomb attack the previous day.
